And to do so, we need your help. We pray for your help and the help of the Holy Spirit to do the job that you've called us to do. We love you and thank you for being the perfect Heavenly Father. We trust that you'll give us what we need when we need it. Thank you for allowing suffering in our lives that pushes us to you, that brings us to our knees. Thank you for building character and maturity in us. And I pray that we could pass that along to our kids. You blessed us so we can be a blessing. And I pray that for every father that's standing today, that you would bless them and encourage them today in Jesus' name. Amen.
